meanings.definition: Not controlled or run by the government.
meanings.sent1: The nongovernmental organization provided aid to the community.
meanings.sent2: She preferred working for nongovernmental agencies.
meanings.sent3: The cat declared itself a nongovernmental ruler of the house.
meanings.sent4: Her creativity was a nongovernmental force, untouched by external influences.
meanings.sent5: The nongovernmental garden flourished independently, free from official regulations.

meanings.definition: Relating to organizations that are independent of government control.
meanings.sent1: The nongovernmental sector played a crucial role in disaster relief efforts.
meanings.sent2: He admired the nongovernmental initiatives for social change.
meanings.sent3: The squirrel formed a nongovernmental union to negotiate better nut prices.
meanings.sent4: Her determination was a nongovernmental engine driving progress in the project.
meanings.sent5: The nongovernmental spirit of the volunteers inspired others to join the cause.
